bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: UI: score vs. iteration doesn't correctly display negative scores
bug.description: Under most circumstances, scores are positive - but can be negative for things like VAEs which utilize negative log likelihood. For example, NLL can be negative with a very small standard deviation <denchmark-link:https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2360237/22917025/70b6ca0c-f2d6-11e6-8a99-1bd48e41f8fe.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: To help keep track of duplicates <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/issues/2829>here's a similar issue I filed a few days ago</denchmark-link> ...
Fixed here, will be merged soon: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/2872>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/2872</denchmark-link>
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
